blog.name: libbybeck
blog.title: nb edit witch
blog.description: kai //bi/ they/them //header by spidaerman.

title: the train ride there (hp au)
body:
Cyrus waited patiently in the train cabin. He didn’t know that many people, and the people he knew surely had other friends. His stepmother, also his therapist, said it was low self esteem, a byproduct of bad social anxiety and surely someone would sit by him. A part of him wanted it to be the boy lingering outside resting his arm against the wall. Cyrus recognized the boy from somewhere. His parents were probably famous.

Cyrus knew it was rude to stare, but the boy looked so alone.

Staring at him won’t make him feel any better, Cyrus muttered to himself. He would count to three and on three he would invite the boy in.

“One…. two…” The boy moved away. Cyrus’s eyes followed the boy’s movements down the hall. Cyrus pondered following him, but he doubted that would make a good first impression. So, Cyrus waited inside, hoping someone would say hi to him.

He knew that house meant family, but he was really hoping to make a friend before the sorting ceremony.

He quickly spotted a girl with her head down. Or maybe not a girl. Cyrus wasn’t sure. The black pixie haired person knocked on Cyrus’s cabin door.

“Uh, is this seat taken?” they asked.

“Yeah. Yeah. It’s free. Come sit,” Cyrus’s words were jumbled up and thrown together so quickly the person waiting outside was unsure of what he said. Cyrus made a come in gesture to clarify. They came in.

It was a minute of awkward silence before Cyrus resumed blabbering.

“I’m Cyrus, boy, Mum says I’m gonna get into Hufflepuff. She’s probably right. Who are you?”

“Um, I’m-You probably already know who I am. Take a guess.”

Cyrus took a hard look. They certainly looked familiar.

Cyrus sighed. “Yeah, I don’t know.”

“That’s a first. Andi. Andi Mack. The girl,” Andi rolled their eyes. “Who lived.”

“I’m guessing you don’t like that nickname.”

“Not in the slightest. Andi is fine. I prepare they/them, teen, enby is a good describing word. Stuff like that. My grandparents think I’m gonna get into Ravenclaw but wanna know a secret?”

“Sure, I would love that.”

“I want Gryffindor. Saying it aloud feels so… hmm what’s the word? Liberating.”

“That’s cool.”

“I know right. Gryffindor… brave at heart… i can just imagine it already. Studying by a warm fire. Quidditch. Making house colored theme bracelets. I craft  A LOT. wanna see the ones I brought today?”

Cyrus nodded. He finally made a friend.

Andi showed the bracelets on their arm, explaining the story behind each one. Cyrus tried to listen but got distracted by outside of his and Andi’s cabin. The boy was back. And he looked lonelier than before.

“Hey, Andi I’m really sorry to disrupt you talking about your bracelets… which are lovely by the way… but there’s someone I need to talk to.”

“Oooh who is it?”

“I don’t know his name. But he’s really cute.”

Andi shrugged. They knew what crushes were like. Cyrus definitely had a crush. On a boy. Ooh.

“Go on. Get him.”

Cyrus smiled. “Um, ok.”

Cyrus got up and headed towards the door. What the boy doesn’t want to… Cyrus hesitated. What if the boy wasn’t gay or what if he was gay and decided that Cyrus wasn’t cute enough or what if… His thoughts began spiraling. He turned the knob, opening the door a crack before racing back to his seat.

“I can’t.”

He sat down.

“What do you mean you can’t?” Andi asked, confused.

“He’s… I uh… I can’t.”

“Sure, you can.”

“I really can’t right now, Andi. Maybe he’ll be in my house and then I’ll work up to talking to him.and then i’ll cross that bridge when i get to him.”

“Having a conversation won’t mean you’re dating.”

Cyrus blushed. “BUT BOY CUTE. I WANT TO DATE BOY.”

He said it a little too loudly. TJ turned to look at the cabin heard on and thus to look at Cyrus.

“I forgot to close the door. The door is open. Boy head what I said,” Cyrus started to ramble.

Andi recognize what Cyrus was doing. “Tell me five things you see,” Andi insisted.

“Um, you. The window. The boy. The decently concerning shakiness of the wood in the floor. The reddish carpet of the seat. Smoke coming from the engine of this train,” Cyrus said, feeling his heart slow down.

“Ok,” Andi said, getting up from the red seat. She pulled Cyrus up from his seat and pushed him towards the door. Andi quickly opened the door and shoved Cyrus into the hall.

“Go get him, Cyrus,” Andi said, impulsively.

Cyrus didn’t understand what was happening until it was too late.

The door shut behind him, and he had a feeling that Andi locked it.

Here goes, he said to himself.

He walked up to TJ. “Hi,” he said. “I’m Cyrus.”

TJ looked at him. “You like boys huh?”

Cyrus nodded nervously. “Yeah, I would’ve phrased it more um less chaotic. But yeah, boys are what I like. I like boys.”

“You think I’m cute?”

“I’d say that I didn’t say that… but I know for a fact that you heard me… so yes, I think you’re cute. I like your jacket. Where’d you get it?”

“Slow your roll, cyrus. Amber, my sister, picked it out for my last birthday. I don’t know where she got it. So your friend locked you out of your own cabin, huh?”

Cyrus nodded.

“Well, are you gonna ask to come back in or are you just gonna chill with me until we get to Hogwarts?”

Cyrus debated whether or not to accept TJ’s offer… if it was even an offer. He wasn’t quite sure how to differentiate between sarcasm or genuine honesty. But he was working on it.

“I’ll chill with you, if that’s alright.”

“Yeah, sure. Cyrus. Come on, we should probably find a cabin. The food cart lady doesn’t like ‘loiters’.”

Cyrus laughed. TJ began walking towards a cabin as Cyrus said a quiet thank you to Andi, not that they could hear. Then, they followed TJ down the hall.

“Here it is. My sister’s in here with some girl, but there are still open spots.”

“Cool!” Cyrus called out, hurrying to catch up with TJ.

Cyrus reached the cabin and peeked his heard in. “I’m Cyrus. Who are you two?”

“Amber, TJ’s sister,” said the blonde.

“Buffy, I’m a runner. And hopefully a gryffindor. But who knows.”

“Cyrus. Hufflepuff, hopefully.”

“Well come on in. TJ hasn’t scared you off, has he?” Amber asked as Cyrus found a seat.

“Why would you think that?” Cyrus asked.

Amber pulled lip gloss out of her pocket and started to fiddle with the cap. “Reasons.”

Cyrus didn’t know whether to laugh or be concerned.

This vibe remained in the cabin. A slight one edge feeling, no one tried to subdue it or change it. They rode like that, making conversation every now and then as a group once in a while. But they mainly stayed in two people conversations. TJ and Cyrus. Amber and Buffy. Buffy and Cyrus. TJ and Amber bickering.

Cyrus didn’t know whether to laugh or be concerned.

This vibe remained in the cabin. A slight one edge feeling, no one tried to subdue it or change it. They rode like that, making conversation every now and then as a group once in a while. But they mainly stayed in two people conversations. TJ and Cyrus. Amber and Buffy. Buffy and Cyrus. TJ and Amber bickering.

blog.name: spiderninja1
blog.title: Spiderninja1
blog.description: Storywriter | Artist | Optimist

summary: How Jonah and TJ will Make Up
body:
How Jonah and TJ will Make Up

Cyrus: I’m going to get some water for us. Don’t kill each other… please?

*Jonah looks at TJ with envy.

Jonah: Whatever.

*Cyrus walks away to get drinks.

TJ, in a sympathetic tone: You like him, don’t you?

Jonah: Of course I like him. He’s my best friend.

TJ: We both know that’s not what I meant.

*Jonah gives off a look of surprise.

Jonah: Uhh…

TJ: You don’t need to tell me. It’s fine.

*TJ sits on the couch, showing a half smile.

TJ: For the record, I like him too.

tags: PLEASE SHARE AND REBLOG SO OTHERS CAN SEE
summary: Hello everyone! So I decided to make this set of Tyrus Challenges since Andi Mack is on hiatus and thought this might help make...
caption:
Hello everyone! So I decided to make this set of Tyrus Challenges since Andi Mack is on hiatus and thought this might help make some Tyrus content!

This is targeted more towards gif and graphic makers, but some of these you can simply make a text post sharing your opinion, draw fanart, or write a short fic! 

You can tag all of your creations with the hashtag #tyruschallenge so others can see! 

I would appreciate it if you could reblog/share so others could see!

  1. Favorite Tyrus Scene
  2. Favorite smile(s) that TJ gives to Cyrus
  3. Favorite smile(s) that Cyrus gives to TJ
  4. Favorite moment in the motorbike scene
  5. Favorite helpful moment (*)
  6. Favorite Tyrus quotes
  7. Favorite Para || el 
  8. Favorite Tyrus Scenery 
  9. Tyrus + Color of your choice 
  10. Tyrus + Flowers
  11. Tyrus + Seasons
  12. Tyrus + Song Lyrics
  13. Tyrus + Fake Quotes
  14. Tyrus + Quote 
  15. Tyrus + Greek Mythology 
  16. Tyrus + Angst 
  17. Tyrus + Elements 
  18. Tyrus + MBTI
  19. Tyrus + Astrology/Signs
  20. Tyrus + Monochromatic
  21. Tyrus + Emojis
  22. Tyrus + Yearbook (Best ___ or Most likely to ___)
  23. Tyrus + 3 Words that describe their relationship 
  24. Tyrus (Movie/TV Show) Crossover 
  25. Swing Scene 1.0 or Swing Scene 2.0
  26. Tyrus scene you wanted to see that was mentioned, but never shown (**)
  27. What do you love about Tyrus?
  28. Where would they go on their first date? 
  29. When do you think TJ began to like Cyrus? 
  30. When do you think Cyrus began to like TJ? 
  31. Tyrus + [Anything you’d like!]

*Cyrus & TJ during the basketball game, TJ teaching Cyrus to do a somersault, etc.

**Exchanging phone numbers, TJ showing this peers his C on his math test, etc. 

There is no time limit with these challenges. You can also make one of these or many of these. Let your mind roam free and enjoy! In addition, you don’t have to go in order! You can do which every ones you’d like in whatever order you want!
